ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Recent changes to pets
ygData.msgSnippet: There is still no refresh on charm.  Verant didn t actually say pets are being treated as PC when proc ing.  Just that they would be proc ing under the same
ygData.messageBody:
There is still no refresh on charm. Verant didn't actually say pets are
being treated as PC when proc'ing. Just that they would be proc'ing under
the same benefits/restrictions as PC's. The statement that people refer to
was a bad choice of words by Absor.

-Steve

At 01:26 PM 12/13/00 -0800, you wrote:
>Hmm, if there was a pc/npc code change then is charm refreshable?
>Probably not but I'm not home to check.
>
>Ninev Rudeflute
>E'ci
>
>Nice to see ya again Galtin :)
>Getting lost in CC sucked, by the time you said there was a back out I
>was already stuck somewhere far far away.
>
>
>--- Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
>> Now that pets are treated as PCs instead of NPCs when it comes to
>> procing,
>
>-el sniparoonie-
>
>>
>> Galtin of E'ci
